summary: A Canadian aboriginal woman journeys to the Arctic in search of a missing member of her tribe, and falls in love with a man from a rival clan.
cast: Roseanne Supernault|Ipeelie Ootoova|Uapshkuss Thernish|Eric Schweig|Graham Greene|Tantoo Cardinal|Flint Eagle|Peter Miller|Natar Ungalaaq|Lamech Kadloo|Annie Galipeau|Jean-Louis Fontaine|Stuart Myiow Jr.|Pakak Innuksuk|Paul-André Brasseur|Marci Nakuset Shapiro|Kathia Rock|Ben Watt|Laurent Arnatsiaq|Annie Neevee Buscemi|Lucy Tulugarjuk|Reneltta Arluk|Mary Buscemi|Paul-Dylan Qulitalik|Nuvvija Tulugarjuk
title: Maïna
